articles.title: CPRK Blasts S. Korean Forces' Rhetoric against DPRK
articles.content:
CPRK Blasts S. Korean Forces' Rhetoric against DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA Sunday as regards the fact that undesirable happenings vitiating the atmosphere for the improvement of the north-south ties are manifested in south Korea from the outset of the new year:
					 All Koreans and the international community are fully supporting and welcoming the historic New Year Address made by the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un and are unanimously wishing for a new phase for peace on the Korean Peninsula and its reunification through earlier improvement of the north-south ties.
					
					 The New Year Address reflects the consistent efforts and steadfast will of the DPRK and desire of all Koreans for the peaceful economic construction, improvement of the people's living standard, detente on the peninsula, the overhaul of the north-south ties and peace and reunification of the country.
					
					 But ill-boding developments quite contrary to this are being observed in south Korea.
					
					 From the outset of the year there heard from south Korea such reckless remarks of tarnishing the atmosphere for improving the north-south ties as "punishment" and "annihilation" and the three services of the puppet army and even  marine corps are being hurled to powder-reeking north-targeted war drills.
					
					 Even such outpourings as "sincerity" and "double-dealing tactics" daring insult the good faith shown by the DPRK are being heard.
					
					 South Korea is responding to the DPRK's just call for rejecting outsiders and firmly maintaining the stand of By Our Nation Itself with strengthened collusion and increased cooperation with the U.S. over the nuclear issue of the DPRK. Seoul also answered Pyongyang's call for defending security and peace of the nation with bellicose remarks and provocative saber-rattling. It also challenged the DPRK's call for ending slanders against the other side to improve the bilateral ties with malignant slanders and calumnies. How can such response be understood?
					
					 This just indicates that south Korea has no will to improve the relations with the north but will keep to the path of confrontation and war this year, too.
					
					 The quite differing stands and attitudes shown by the north and the south in the new year prove who is a provoker plunging the north-south ties into deadlock and harassing peace.
					
					 Whatever rhetoric the black-hearted south Korean forces may let loose, no one will lend an ear to it.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should set right their confrontational stand and attitude if they want to say anything about the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The improvement of the north-south ties can not be achieved by the efforts of one side only.
					
					 The prospect for the north-south ties entirely depends on the attitude of the south Korean authorities.

articles.title: Nationwide Drive for Reunification Called for
articles.content:
Nationwide Drive for Reunification Called for 
						
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- The Commonwealth of Independent States Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification on Thursday made public a statement calling for fully implementing the tasks for national reunification set forth by Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address. 
					 The statement said:
					
					 Kim Jong Un said that all the Korean people in the north and the south and abroad should achieve solid unity under the truly patriotic banner, in the idea of By Our Nation Itself, and turn out in the nationwide struggle for the reunification of the country. By doing so, they should open up a new phase for independent reunification, peace and prosperity this year, he added. 
					
					 National reunification is the lifelong wishes and behests of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the urgent task which should never be delayed any longer. 
					
					 We will reject outside forces and firmly preserve the idea of By Our Nation Itself and wage an unflinching struggle to implement the June 15 Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration, a landmark for national reunification and peace and prosperity. 
					
					 We will actively turn out in the nationwide struggle for protecting security and peace of the nation and resolutely frustrating the confrontation and war moves of warmongers at home and abroad. 
					
					 It is the prerequisite for bringing about earlier national reunification to provide atmosphere for mending the relations between the north and the south. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should not be bent on reckless moves for confrontation with fellow countrymen and campaign for eliminating the "forces following the north", but lend an ear to the voice of Koreans demanding independence, democracy and national reunification and opt for improving the north-south relations. 
					
					 We believe that national reunification will surely be achieved despite all sorts of ordeals and difficulties.

articles.title: Soldiers of KPA Vow to Thoroughly Implement Tasks Set forth in New Year Address
articles.content:
Soldiers Vow to Thoroughly Implement Tasks Set forth in New Year Address
						
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- The service personnel of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces held a meeting to vow to thoroughly implement the tasks set forth by Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address. They met at the April 25 House of Culture on Saturday.
					 Present at the meeting were Ri Yong Gil, chief of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army (KPA), Jang Jong Nam, minister of the People's Armed Forces, officials of the ministry and KPA soldiers.
					
					 A report by Jang Jong Nam was followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said Kim Jong Un's New Year Address serves as guidelines indicating the short-cut to the heyday of Songun Korea and an inspiring banner encouraging the party, army and people to dynamically advance for a greater victory, united close around the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 They referred to the fact that Kim Jong Un glorified significant year 2013 with miraculous events by wisely leading the army and people of the country.
					
					 They noted that through the struggle of last year all the army and people cherished the immutable truth that nobody can check the sacred cause of the Korean people advancing to a great goal upholding Kim Jong Un, adding that the people have turned out in the march of new year with confidence in sure victory and optimism.
					
					 They call on all the participants to successfully discharge the honorable mission and duty of the powerful revolutionary army of the President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un in building a thriving nation and accomplishing the cause of national reunification this year.
					
					 They stressed that the tasks of struggle for this year are difficult and gigantic but only victory and glory will be in store for the Korean army and people thanks to the outstanding and seasoned leadership of Kim Jong Un, adding all the people should make a dynamic struggle for a greater victory this year, united close around the Party in single mind.

articles.title: 30th Anniversary of Pukchang Area Coal-Mining Complex Marked
articles.content:
30th Anniversary of Pukchang Area Coal-Mining Complex Marked 
 Pukchang, January 5 (KCNA) -- The Pukchang Area Coal-Mining Complex in South Phyongan Province will greet its 30th anniversary on Monday. 
					 For three decades since its establishment on January 6, Juche 73 (1984) the complex has made proud history. 
					
					 Workers and officials of the complex have made contributions to increasing the production of electricity and hastening economic construction by timely providing coal to different fields of the national economy. 
					
					 A meeting to mark the anniversary took place on Sunday. 
					
					 Present at the meeting were Mun Myong Hak, minister of Coal Industry, and officials and employees of the complex.
					
					 A congratulatory message of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea to the workers, technicians and officials of the complex was read out at the meeting.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
IIJI Secretary General Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun 
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- Secretary-General of the International Institute of the Juche Idea Kenichi Ogami and his party visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun to pay homage to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Sunday. 
					 The visitors paid tribute to the statues of peerless great men Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, who created the Juche idea and developed it and made immortal contributions to accomplishing the cause of global independence.
					
					 The guests entered the halls where Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state and made bows to them in humblest reverence. 
					
					 They went round the halls where orders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il received are on display and the halls that house cars, an electric car, a boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign trips till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Achieving National Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Achieving National Reunification
						
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- It is the sacred duty of all Koreans and a solemn call of the history of the nation to put an end to the national separation and reunify the country as early as possible, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in an article. 
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The Korean nation is a homogeneous one like an organism which can not live separated. 
					
					 The Korean nation is the only separated nation in the world. 
					
					 The sovereignty of the Korean nation is trampled down by the U.S. military occupation of south Korea and national partition thereof. 
					
					 The Korean nation suffers huge damage as its sovereignty is not established in whole land of Korea. 
					
					 Originally Korea has rich potentials for building a prosperous and powerful country in view of its territory, population and natural resources. 
					
					 But, national separation prevents Koreans from using in a unified way the potential of the nation for prosperity. 
					
					 It is shame that the natural resources of the country are being used for escalating confrontation and war, not for development of the nation. 
					
					 Only when the nation is reunified will it be possible to put an end to this tragedy. 
					
					 Success or failure of national reunification depends on the united struggle of Koreans in the north and the south and overseas. 
					
					 All Koreans should make positive contributions to the cause of national reunification wherever they may be and what kind of work they may do. 
					
					 Steadfast is the will of Koreans to open up a fresh phase for independent reunification, peace and prosperity of the country under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, true to the last instructions of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on national reunification.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Japan for Justifying Past Crimes
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Japan for Justifying Past Crimes
						
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- A few days ago, the Higashi Osaka City authorities of Japan expressed "protest" against the erection of a sculpture depicting a comfort woman for the Imperial Japanese Army in Glendale City, California of the U.S. and bluffed that they would stop a plan of dispatching students. This is nothing but a mean behavior of Samurais, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in a commentary. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is natural for the Japanese politicians to feel shame for the construction of the sculptures and monuments in  the U.S. whom they regard as their master, if they have normal way of thinking. 
					
					 What is more intolerable is that Japan, which is obliged to make an apology and reflect on its big crimes down through generations, openly denies and justifies its filthy crimes in the face of living victims. 
					
					 The chief executive of Japan is taking the lead in these moves. 
					
					 Abe is a shameless and militarist maniac who denies reflection on the past crimes. His subordinates are running amuck in distorting history. 
					
					 It is only militarist slaves and the mentally deformed who grow in the land where dirty politics are prevalent. 
					
					 The Japanese politicians should clearly bear in mind that denial of history will lead to a ruin of the country. 
					
					 If Japan opts for reinvasion denying the past war crimes as now, it will face international isolation and disgraceful destruction. This is a warning served by the times and people to the Japanese politicians who shamelessly run amuck in distorting history.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Demanded to Step Down
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Demanded to Step Down
						
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) held a press conference at Seoul station plaza on January 3, in which it declared an action to force the puppet regime to step down.
					 The organization said that the south Korean police's forcible entry into the headquarters of the KCTU was made pursuant to the present regime's policy for stamping out the labor movement.
					
					 The organization noted that it would stage a dynamic general strike, all-people struggle for forcing the present regime to step down and checking privatization.

articles.title: S. Korean Troops Stage War Exercises
articles.content:
S. Korean Troops Stage War Exercises
						
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- The 17th Division of south Korean army on Jan. 2 waged war drills under the simulated conditions of an all-out war against the north in Inchon and Kimpho and Puchon of Kyonggi Province.
					 South Korean trigger-happy forces formed a group of combatant staff officers to hold the command and control exercise under the pretext of coping with the threat to the south increased by the north's provocation.
					
					 They also conducted a strategic march drill and an exercise of firing guns and other firearms under the simulated conditions of an actual battle.
					
					 Such frantic war drills against the north waged from the first days of the new year seriously threaten the security and peace of the nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Austria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Austria 
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- The Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK on Dec. 29 last year posted on its internet website the full text of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun". 
					 The work is the speech he made at the military parade in celebration of the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung on April 15, Juche 101 (2012). It says that 100 year-long history of Kim Il Sung's nation proves the truth that dignity of the nation and its prosperity are guaranteed when it is led by an outstanding leader. 
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for glorifying the dignity of Songun Korea forever and successfully building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: DPRK's Rapid Progress Praised by Vietnamese Figure
articles.content:
DPRK's Rapid Progress Praised by Vietnamese Figure
						
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- Le Quang Ba, Vietnamese ambassador to the DPRK, at an interview with a reporter of the Vietnamese paper Lao Dong spoke highly of the rapid development in the DPRK.
					 He said that he was honored by the presence of Marshal Kim Jong Un several times while he was working in the DPRK, adding the young leader of the DPRK is very modest, polite and open-minded.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Today the DPRK is directing all efforts to the economic construction including agriculture and light industry and improvement of the people's living standard.
					
					 Pyongyang is very modern city.
					
					 Foreigners visiting the city are struck with admiration to see the structures of peculiar styles. 
					
					 Of late a Western media reported that the DPRK made rapid progress under the leadership of Kim Jong Un. This is a correct evaluation.
					
					 In the DPRK the construction is brisk not only in Pyongyang but in provinces. I have not seen such a beautiful city as Pyongyang in any other country.
					
					 We should deeply study and learn from the DPRK's successes.
					
					 The power of the DPRK is the mental one of the people and the DPRK built the reliable defense capacity relying on it.
					
					 Lao Dong carried the content of the interview illustrated with a photo of Kim Jong Un on December 24, 2013.
					
					 Most of websites including the internet news VN Express carried the same news.
